Sequence Information.Peptide Name: duck LEAP-2 (natural AMPs; birds, animals; 2S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 95% similarity toChicken LEAP-2, only differing at two residues. The propsoed 2 S-S bonds are C17-C28, C23-C33.Activity: Active against S. aureus, E. coli (90% killing at 50 ug/mL), and L. monocytogenes by membrane permeation. more active against Gram+. 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Hong Y, Truong AD, Lee J, Lee K, Kim GB, Heo KN, Lillehoj HS, Hong YH.2018
Literature Information.Reference: Asian-Australas J Anim Sci. 2018 Oct 29. doi: 10.5713/ajas.18.0571.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Identification of duck liver-expressed antimicrobial peptide 2 (LEAP-2) and characterization of its bactericidal activity
